name: Xcel Axis Flatlock 3/2mm Long Sleeve Back Zip Full - Men's
categories: Axis Flatlock 3/2mm Long Sleeve Back Zip Full
description: Suit up for Canadian summer. Made of super stretchy neoprene, this back-entry wetsuit won't restrict your moves when you're catching a wave.Eco Limestone Veoprene with flatlock seam construction.3mm thick neoprene on the torso.2mm thick neoprene on the legs and arms.Duraflex knee panels.Water-tight back zipper entry.Recommended water temperature: 13-18°C.
